title: What are some examples of outdoor recreational activities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Golf and Miniature Golf, Paint Balling, Basketball, Soccer, Baseball, Canoeing and Kayaking, Hiking, Paddle Boating, White Water Rafting, Walking, Cycling and Running, Outdoor Trampolining, Tennis, Badminton, Beach Volley ball, Racket Ball Squash Hacky Sack Bungee jump and Sky Diving Sking and Water Sking Obsticle course, Zip wire
